positive.review: unfortunately app won't start when my pc boots

Amazing free live wallpaper software! Tons of beautiful anime/game backgrounds and it runs super smooth. What makes it even better are the features — you can add clock, typing animations, music visualizers, and much more at once in 1 software to customize your desktop exactly how you like it and the community keeps adding new wallpapers every day. No subscription, no paywall, just pure quality for anime/game fans who want an aesthetic desktop without spending anything. Highly recommended!
alot more then jus a wallpaper app very worth it tho(im being touched)
good enough  ai wallpapers are majoity thhogh
good for guys who dont have the money for wallpaper engine
mid but every time u open u get flashed..
a good free alternative to wallpaper engine
I went to wallpaper engine and i didnt want to spend money on a wallpaper found this and it's just like wallpaper engine

great artworks maybe some of them without animation will be nice. it take some time to get hang of setting
generally nice app
unfortunately app won't start when my pc boots

this is a actuall good way to change your wallpaper without having to do nearly as many things as you having to look through your file and not being able to find it this is a really easy way to change it and thats why its good

negative.review:
There is so much potential in this app, if only there's a way to make chinese tag into english, then this app is great....
My only problem is most of content is in Chinese and there is no way to searching what I looking for because of most of them written in Chinese, not in roman...
I hope there will be a way from dev to make any language connected in the search bar, instead of standart word-by-word way of search, because as far as I saw, many wallpaper is look so good.

This Wallpaper App Doesn't Even Work Properly, Once You Subscribe To Something & Change The Wallpaper. Your Screwed & Can't Reuse The One You Subscribed To. This App Has So May Bug Issues. Might As Well Get Wallpaper Engine & Pay The $5 To Save Yourself The Headache
no

app is very buggy, a bunch of ass ai wallpapers, not very much good casual ones (in the anime side of things) Basically only use this if you have a wallpaper downloaded. the music bar system is cool, but u have to subscribe to it again if you close the app and reopen. Sometimes when i closed the app and reopen the wallpaper i had turns white, making me resubscribe to it. Its supposed to run in the background but when i close the app it just shuts off completely (i checked settings) This app has potential to be better, fix the bugs, optimize it more and anyone could enjoy it. Bocchi rain wallpaper is the best one!

When you add your own video clip to have a live wallpaper it takes forever to generate the cover. I mean how long does it take to generate a cover for a 10 second video? Or is there something else going on like mining?

There is so much potential in this app, if only there's a way to make chinese tag into english, then this app is great....
My only problem is most of content is in Chinese and there is no way to searching what I looking for because of most of them written in Chinese, not in roman...
I hope there will be a way from dev to make any language connected in the search bar, instead of standart word-by-word way of search, because as far as I saw, many wallpaper is look so good.

This Wallpaper App Doesn't Even Work Properly, Once You Subscribe To Something & Change The Wallpaper. Your Screwed & Can't Reuse The One You Subscribed To. This App Has So May Bug Issues. Might As Well Get Wallpaper Engine & Pay The $5 To Save Yourself The Headache
I will not recommend too anyone, when you get it , it feels clickbait.
it crashed my pc
